H0.text: Which company was built into a world-wide organisation by Ray Kroc. Burger King

H1.text: Which company was built into a world-wide organisation by Ray Kroc. KFC

H2.text: Which company was built into a world-wide organisation by Ray Kroc. Starbucks

H3.text: Which company was built into a world-wide organisation by Ray Kroc. McD

A4.text: In 1955, the businessman Ray Kroc joined McDonald's as a franchise agent; he bought the company in 1961.

A5.text: In 1961, he purchased the McDonald brothers' equity in the company and began the company's worldwide reach.
